name: TheAtlantic
text: "[Trump] believes the United States is getting ripped off by the rest of the world. He sees allies, trade deficits, and immigrants as the primary national-security threats facing the country," @thomaswright08 writes: https://t.co/DuQJZJL9Pe

name: TheAtlantic
text: When predictive technologies systematically discriminate against people of color, adolescents are especially vulnerable, @kingavriel writes. https://t.co/4SI2BWJxpX
